title: Safety Protocol — Creekside Acupuncture & Natural Medicine
cleaned_text: Safety Protocols at Creekside Acupuncture For Patients Please cancel your appointment if you have any new symptoms that may be Covid-19 symptoms, or think you were recently exposed to SARS-CoV-2. If you are recovering from Covid-19 I require a negative rapid antigen test before I see you. Masks are recommended for your health and safety, but optional. Please reach out to me if you would like to request that your time in the office not overlap with any other patients or any unmasked patients. Safety Procedures at Creekside Acupuncture I am vaccinated and up-to-date on boosters against SARS-CoV-2. I wear a mask at all times. The treatment table is covered with disposable paper products and changed between every patient. Windows are open whenever possible. There are HEPA air filters in each treatment room.
